body: As I was saying chimps are incredible, they're just sold muscle man they are like, unstoppable. have you seen that video of a chimp pulling apart an apache attack helicopter? Jamie! pull that shit up... yeah look he's just dismantling it... ohhh...  it's not even hard for him, it's like it's a game too him, he's problely just doing it because he felt like it too. So This one time right, i was in Africa smoking dmt in the bush right, just smoking another dmt as you do right and this chimp comes up to me and he's standing there looking at me so I'm thinking too myself "this is incredible I need to interact with this majestic creature" so I hand it the dmt and it looks at it for a second thinking... then it takes a long drag...

Part 2: it doesn't even exhale the smoke. It doesn't need too. It's not weak like us humans. It's a chimp. So after about 8 seconds you can see the dmt has hit him, he looks into the sky and smiles... you know what he does next? He transcends the physical form that all mortal lifeforms are bound to. Effortlessly. It's not even hard for him. He's free. then he just disappears... I think he probably created his own universe somewhere else... it probably wasn't even hard for him... he just did it because he felt like it... Jamie! Pull that shit up.
Why it's shotacon?!! Why for fuck sake?!! T_T
god dammit, I feel like were gonna see a dozen doujinshi before we actually get to play the game.
Kik me you dirty perverts kik ID : LoliRaper
